subject: Throttle input not registering
description_text:
Hello,

I recently received a set of Pro Plus throttle and brake. The throttle was
working fine until I attempted to reverse the mounting feet to angle the
peddle further back.

When reassembling, a small silver spring fell out of the bottom of the
peddle and now the throttle will not register an input in the software.

I am unable to get the peddle back together with the silver spring in place
and need help reassembling the peddle correctly.

Do you have any videos/tutorials/diagrams on how to properly reassemble the
peddle?

Thank you,
Colton



-- 
*F. Colton Barnes*
(606) 275-2150

conversations.body_text: Hi Colton Barnes,  You can use a small screwdriver to press the spring into the correct position easily.

That worked perfectly, all fixed now. Thank you very much!

FCB
